mapper.insert: INSERT INTO uuid_relation(fk_type_id, uuid, is_used, expire_time) VALUES (#{fkTypeId}, #{uuid}, #{isUsed}, #{expireTime});
mapper.select: select uuid_relation.id as id, uuid_relation.fk_type_id as fkTypeId, uuid_relation.uuid as uuid, uuid_relation.is_used as isUsed, uuid_relation.expire_time as expireTime from uuid_relation where uuid_relation.uuid= #{shareCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribed_relation(fk_type_id, fk_user_id, fk_creator_id, subscribe_time) VALUES (#{fkTypeId}, #{fkUserId}, #{fkCreatorId}, #{subscribeTime});
mapper.select: select subscribed_relation.id as id, subscribed_relation.fk_type_id as fkTypeId, subscribed_relation.fk_user_id as userId, subscribed_relation.fk_creator_id as fkCreatorId, subscribed_relation.subscribe_time as subscribeTime from subscribed_relation where subscribed_relation.fk_type_id= #{typeId} and subscribed_relation.fk_user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: delete from subscribed_relation where subscribed_relation.fk_user_id = #{userId} and subscribed_relation.fk_type_id = #{typeId}
mapper.select: select subscribed_relation.id as id, subscribed_relation.fk_type_id as fkTypeId, subscribed_relation.fk_user_id as userId, subscribed_relation.fk_creator_id as fkCreatorId, subscribed_relation.subscribe_time as subscribeTime from subscribed_relation where subscribed_relation.fk_user_id = #{userId}
